players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this game."
Diana: "Let's focus on finding the truth about Charlie's death and make sure we don't jump to conclusions. We should also keep an eye on Bob since they were investigated last night."
You: "Let's all be honest and share our thoughts about Charlie's death. Maybe we can work together to find the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
